title.en: In Praise of the Eight Mahāsiddhas

text.en: Namo Gurubhyaḥ!
text.en-trans: namo guru bhye

text.en: Dharmakāya Vajradhara having the colour of the sky,
text.en-trans: namkhé dokchen chöku dorjé chang

text.en: Majestic with bone ornaments, holding a vajra and bell,
text.en-trans: gying bak rügyen dorjé drilbu dzin

text.en: Together with the ḍākinī consort pink Khechari;
text.en-trans: khachö kar mar khandro yum dangché

text.en: To the supreme father Vajradhara I praise.
text.en-trans: pa chok dorjé chang la solwa deb

text.en: Nāgārjuna, radiantly saffron, ornament of the Southern Continent,
text.en-trans: kur gum dangden ludrub dzamling gyen

text.en: With a forest goddess offering the nectar of immortality,
text.en-trans: nak kyi lha mö chimé dütsi pul

text.en: Having gained the attainments, teaching uninterruptedly for the benefit of others;
text.en-trans: ngödrub nyé né zhendön gyün mi ché

text.en: To the great accomplished one of supreme space I praise.
text.en-trans: khé chok drubchen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Indrabhūti, the colour of bluish smoke,
text.en-trans: indra bhu ti jangngön duwé dok

text.en: Dwelling in the land of Orgyan in the manner of royalty,
text.en-trans: gyalrik chöpa orgyen né su zhuk

text.en: Together with [his] son departing for Khechara;
text.en-trans: sé dang lhenchik khachö zhing du shek

text.en: To the holder of the teachings of Secret Mantra I praise.
text.en-trans: sang ngak tendzin la solwa deb

text.en: Ḍombī Heruka, the supreme prince,
text.en-trans: gyalwé chok tam bi heruka

text.en: Maroon and naked, riding on an emanated tiger,
text.en-trans: muknak cherbü dzutrul tak la zhön

text.en: Crossing the Ganges River seated on a mat;
text.en-trans: dingwa ting né chuwo gangga gal

text.en: To the feet of the Lord of emanated power I praise.
text.en-trans: dzutrul wang tob zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Saraha, glorious great Brahmin, golden in colour,
text.en-trans: dramzé chenpo palden sa ra ha

text.en: Using an arrow to pierce afflictions,
text.en-trans: ser dok nyönmong bik da chö ching

text.en: Flying in the sky to the land of Śrī Parvati;
text.en-trans: pal gyi ri yi né su namkhar shek

text.en: To the One who has obtained the power of air-mind I praise.
text.en-trans: lungsem wang tob la solwa deb

text.en: Great adept Ghaṇṭapa having the colour of cotton,
text.en-trans: drubchen ré mé dokchen drilbu pa

text.en: On a trail of light twisting in a rainbow canopy with the consort and son,
text.en-trans: yumsé ja gur khyilwé ö lam du

text.en: Flying into the sky ringing a vajra and bell;
text.en-trans: dorjé drilbu sil né namkhar shek

text.en: To the one who has obtained the power of Khechara I praise.
text.en-trans: khachö wang tob zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Glorious Kukkurīpā, whitish-grey,
text.en-trans: kar sham dokchen palden kukuri

text.en: Madly playing with a ḍākinī in the form of a dog,
text.en-trans: nyöjé khandro khyi zuk bam né rol

text.en: Acquiring the attainments and without obstruction flying into the sky;
text.en-trans: ngödrub nyé né tokmé kha la shek

text.en: To the feet of the king of great accomplishment I praise.
text.en-trans: drubchen gyalpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Royal prince, Luipa, of smoky radiance,
text.en-trans: dükhé dangden gyalsé lu hipa

text.en: Acquiring the attainments eating the guts of cruel fish,
text.en-trans: dukpé nya tö sol né ngödrub nyé

text.en: Crossing the ocean of existence [while] keeping the behaviour of a monk;
text.en-trans: gelong tsul dzin khorwé gyatso gal

text.en: To the feet of the one holding the supreme conduct I praise.
text.en-trans: tulzhuk chokden zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Padmavajra in the form of a layman, white in colour,
text.en-trans: pema benza dok kar khyimpé zuk

text.en: Performing the path of supreme meditation and eating only fruit,
text.en-trans: shingtok sol zhing lam chok gompar dzé

text.en: Flying in the sky, riding an emanated tigress;
text.en-trans: dzutrul takmo chib té namkhar shek

text.en: To the feet of the one who subdues evil I praise.
text.en-trans: dukchen dul dzé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of this praise,
text.en-trans: drubchen gyé la solwa tabpé tü

text.en: May we together, teachers, students and sponsors,
text.en-trans: dakchak pönlob yönchö khor ché kyi

text.en: I request, at all times be free from negative obstacles
text.en-trans: nekab küntu mitün barché sel

text.en: And be taken onto the positive Dharma path.
text.en-trans: tünpé lam na chö la drang du sol
